name: Hindu Kush
description: Hindu Kush is a pure indica strain named after the mountain range stretching 500 miles between Pakistan and Afghanistan where it originated. The harsh climate of its homeland has conditioned this strain to express a thick, protective coat of crystal trichomes cherished by hash makers worldwide. With a subtle sweet and earthy sandalwoodÂ aroma, Hindu Kush induces a deep sense of calm that helps bring relief to those suffering pain, nausea, and stress disorders.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Hungry, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid, Dizzy
